fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • We misnamed the campaign group Waspi – Women Against State Pension Inequality – as “Women against state pension increases” and mistakenly said they now go by the name Back to 60. The latter is a separate campaign group (‘Frozen’ pensioners need help even more than Waspi women, 7 December, page 51). • A picture captioned as showing Buxton in Derbyshire was actually of Leek, Staffordshire, about 13 miles away (Bright lights, small towns, 7 December, page 2, Travel). • Other recently corrected articles include: Your favourite travel books: readers’ tips
